identificationModule.officialTitle: Effects of Nocturnal Inorganic Nitrate Supplementation on Physiological Function

descriptionModule.briefSummary: The purpose of this study is to investigate the effects of acute inorganic nitrate supplementation (with beetroot) on the regulation of sleep and neurovascular physiology.

armGroups.label: Active Beetroot Juice Supplement (aBRJ) then Placebo Beetroot Juice Supplement (pBRJ)
armGroups.description: Subjects randomized to this arm of the study will have aBRJ administered during Visit 2 and then pBRJ administered during Visit 3.
interventionNames: Dietary Supplement: Active Beetroot Juice Supplement (aBRJ)
Dietary Supplement: Placebo Beetroot Juice Supplement (pBRJ)

armGroups.label: Placebo Beetroot Juice Supplement (pBRJ) then Active Beetroot Juice Supplement (aBRJ)
armGroups.description: Subjects randomized to this arm of the study will have pBRJ administered during Visit 2 and then aBRJ administered during Visit 3.
interventionNames: Dietary Supplement: Active Beetroot Juice Supplement (aBRJ)
Dietary Supplement: Placebo Beetroot Juice Supplement (pBRJ)

interventions.name: Active Beetroot Juice Supplement (aBRJ)
interventions.description: aBRJ will consist of 70ml concentrated beetroot juice with 6.45-7.26mmol inorganic nitrate (range for inter-batch variability) taken orally.
armGroupLabels: Active Beetroot Juice Supplement (aBRJ) then Placebo Beetroot Juice Supplement (pBRJ)
Placebo Beetroot Juice Supplement (pBRJ) then Active Beetroot Juice Supplement (aBRJ)

interventions.name: Placebo Beetroot Juice Supplement (pBRJ)
interventions.description: pBRJ will consist of 70ml concentrated beetroot juice and will be chemically devoid of inorganic nitrate taken orally.
armGroupLabels: Active Beetroot Juice Supplement (aBRJ) then Placebo Beetroot Juice Supplement (pBRJ)
Placebo Beetroot Juice Supplement (pBRJ) then Active Beetroot Juice Supplement (aBRJ)

primaryOutcomes.measure: Change in the amount of time in stage three sleep
primaryOutcomes.description: Measured overnight polysomnography (PSG) used to identify sleep staging, reported in minutes
primaryOutcomes.timeFrame: Baseline, approximately 30 days, and approximately 60 days

primaryOutcomes.description: Measured by Pittsburgh Sleep Quality Index which measures the severity of sleep disturbances. Possible scores range from 0 to 21 with higher scores indicating a worse outcome/more severe symptoms of sleep disturbance.
primaryOutcomes.timeFrame: Baseline, approximately 30 days, and approximately 60 days

primaryOutcomes.description: Measured on a visual analog scale of 1-10, where 1 is not at all sleepy and 10 is as sleepy as you can imagine, how sleepy are you right now?
primaryOutcomes.timeFrame: Baseline, approximately 30 days, and approximately 60 days

primaryOutcomes.description: Measured by the Stanford Sleepiness Scale that asks participate to rank their degree of sleepiness where 1 would indicate the subject currently feels least sleepy and 7 would indicate the subject feels the most sleepy.
primaryOutcomes.timeFrame: Baseline, approximately 30 days, and approximately 60 days

primaryOutcomes.description: Measured by Epworth Sleepiness Scale. The test is a list of eight situations in which you rate your tendency to become sleepy on a scale of 0, no chance of dozing, to 3, high chance of dozing. Total score is graded from 0-24. 0-7:It is unlikely that you are abnormally sleepy. 8-9:You have an average amount of daytime sleepiness. 10-15:You may be excessively sleepy depending on the situation. You may want to consider seeking medical attention. 16-24:You are excessively sleepy and should consider seeking medical attention.
primaryOutcomes.timeFrame: Baseline, approximately 30 days, and approximately 60 days

secondaryOutcomes.timeFrame: Baseline, approximately 30 days, and approximately 60 days

secondaryOutcomes.measure: Change in sympathetic nerve burst frequency
secondaryOutcomes.description: Measured by Microneurography reported as number of nerve bursts per minute (burst/min)
secondaryOutcomes.timeFrame: Baseline, approximately 30 days, and approximately 60 days

secondaryOutcomes.measure: Change in sympathetic nerve burst incidence
secondaryOutcomes.description: Measured by Microneurography reported as number of nerve burst per 100 heart beats (burst/100 heart beats)
secondaryOutcomes.timeFrame: Baseline, approximately 30 days, and approximately 60 days

secondaryOutcomes.measure: Change in sympathetic nerve burst amplitude (AU)
secondaryOutcomes.description: Measured by Microneurography reported in arbitrary units (AU)
secondaryOutcomes.timeFrame: Baseline, approximately 30 days, and approximately 60 days

secondaryOutcomes.measure: Change in total muscle sympathetic nerve activity (MSNA)
secondaryOutcomes.description: Measured by Microneurography reported burst arbitrary units per minute (AU/min)
secondaryOutcomes.timeFrame: Baseline, approximately 30 days, and approximately 60 days

secondaryOutcomes.description: Measured by applanation tonometry reported as aortic pulse wave velocity (m/sec)
secondaryOutcomes.timeFrame: Baseline, approximately 30 days, and approximately 60 days

secondaryOutcomes.description: Ultrasound assessment of flow-mediated vasodilation of the brachial artery. Brachial artery diameter and blood velocity will be measured after deflation to measure endothelial function.
secondaryOutcomes.timeFrame: Baseline, approximately 30 days, and approximately 60 days

eligibilityModule.eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* 18-30 or 65-80 years of age

Exclusion Criteria:

* Coronary artery disease
* Heart failure
* Pregnancy
* Diabetes
* Sleep disorders
* Shift workers
* Individuals who typically go to sleep after midnight
* Individuals who traveled across ≥2 time zones within one week of study visits
* Individuals with a history frequent kidney stones
* BMI ≥35.0kg/m2
* Use of nicotine-containing products within the two years preceding study visits
* Use of allopurinol, proton pump inhibitors, or other medications/supplements which interfere with the nitrate-nitrite-nitric oxide pathway or outcome measures
